attributes.review: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway because bees don't care what humans think is impossible. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Ooh, black and yellow! Let's shake it up a little. Barry! Breakfast is ready!

attributes.review: In all honesty I just cannot stand for the ignorance, hatred and down right racism this app promotes. Imagine being a president of an entire country but only caring about the lives of a select few. We have indigenous women missing, kids in cages, Klu Klux Klan members terrorizing the black community, and a rapid surge of COVID-19 cases, and yet he still chooses to tweet such uninformed garbage
